website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for LED candles in a versatile tea light design, you'd have a difficult time finding a better value.
pros: Realistic-looking LED tea lights with batteries (CR2032) that provide up to 100 hours of light
Ideal for party decorations, luminaries, table decor, and more
You get 36 per pack for an affordable price
cons: Flame is almost orange in color, which may not appeal to everyone
A few duds per pack are likely

customer_reviews.title: They last forever
customer_reviews.text: They last forever! I was afraid to turn them on and they would die before I could surprise my boyfriend but I did anyways and they lasted the whole entire night and the whole next day (I didn’t feel like cleaning up, don’t judge me lol). I was very pleased with them. Oh, and the flickering made it feel like they were real. Set the mood for the night perfectly 😉
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These shipped and arrived very quickly and nicely packaged. I ordered these for my wedding in June partially because the reviews for battery life. I also loved the price for how many you get. I received everything I ordered in good and working condition. These are very easy to use, just pull the little tab out of the battery compartment and flip the on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was leary buying these due to the what seems like very affordable cost. Also. The photos made the flame portion seem to be awekwardly high as compared to others. Well, i coundnt be happier with my purchase. As a matter of fact, im buying more! Battery test has 2 lights lasting approx 3 days continuous. On 4th day now but dimming noticably. I even liked the box they came in. Made storage easy. These are by far the best "candle" product i have utilized. Buy them, you wont regret it! Fast shipping, perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: Real.Life.Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very Satistfied
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged very well and was delivered super fast. The candles look like what the picture is shown and easy to use. I recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: shelsea

customer_reviews.title: Buy now.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome led light. Made them into floating candles for a Halloween party. Would recommend look forward to using them again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabricole M

customer_reviews.title: Check out how extremely happy I was with this product
customer_reviews.text: These Flameless LED Tea Lights was a hit for my weekend rendezvous! It highlighted my evening as well as helped me save time from constantly lighting matches or lighters. Check out how extremely happy I was with this product. And the best part about it is, I used them from 6 pm one evening until the next morning at 11am and they were still bright. Battery life is Great. Thank you so much for helping make my evening exciting and spectacular!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lekeysha Alston-Page

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to buy a pack of batteries for this.
customer_reviews.text: Be ready to buy a set of batteries with this. They are super simple tea lights but the batteries didn't last 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: BURNED OUT
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother buying these. I bought a new set and all of them died within 3 days. The small batteries included burn out very, very quickly ruining the fun. I would never ever buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: rob225

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to light up the room for a Harry Potter themed lock-in for our Scout Troop. We placed them on top of paper rolled up and let them hang from fishing line so they appeared to float in the sky. They were GORGEOUS and lasted the entire night and probably would have kept burning but we had to take them down the next day. Super great product for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: High Impact Durable Little Candles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 boxes of these tea candles. They come with batteries already installed to make use that much easier and quicker. They all work great and come nicely packaged. I saved the boxes to store them in. You'll love these candles too for your special event!
customer_reviews.author: girlinpearls

customer_reviews.title: Easy, simple - great addition to decor!
customer_reviews.text: These simple, but beautiful candles were a great addition to our table decor. Easy removable battery tag. All 4 boxes all in working order. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: NBD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent led candles for party decors. Worth buying...
customer_reviews.text: These Light Candles are simply amazing for any party decorations. The lights comes in a neatly and safely packed box, with each light protected with battery tape so that you don't loose the battery power. I liked the flickering effect, it makes look like a real candle light. Light tone is more like a fire compared to other brand products i have used before. Good that i choose this one. Highly recommend the product its worth for the dollar spent and each light battery lasts for about 3-4 days. Unluckily one of the candle didn't work out of the box for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay

customer_reviews.title: FLICKERS ORANGE not a soft white glow
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughters wedding due to the long battery life reviews, but the color of the flame flickers is ORANGE and unrealistic looking. These looks like something that should be used at Halloween, NOT at a wedding. The flame shape is weird, too. It is awkwardly tall and stands up about an inch from the candle. I ended up purchasing another brand that were a warm white color and flickered a MUCH more realistic look.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great value, all worked, perfect for jack-o'-lanterns
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! We ordered them to place in Halloween pumpkins carved by adults and children at a party. They are much safer than the tea candles we've used before and looked at least as good when we turned out the lights to admire our work. I expected a few to be duds but every one of them worked, no doubt aided by the tab protecting the battery that needed to be pulled out before turning them on. We will definitely order them again! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - recommended!
customer_reviews.text: These lights were purchased for a surprise outdoor vow renewal ceremony and they worked great! The lights emit a soft glow and flicker a bit (in a good way) so they do look a little more realistic. They stayed cool which was important for us, as we had these placed on the ground outdoors (safe). Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only last 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: We had these in a lantern for halloween. It says 100 hours Lasted 3 days. Amd werw off durimg the day
customer_reviews.author: twm

customer_reviews.title: Half of the tea lights came WITHOUT their batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Am only giving this product one star because 18 of the tea lights work but the other half don't have the batteries needed for them to work.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Seagull

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery operated tea lights!!! Far and above the best I have used!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little tea light candles!!!! Lasted 8 hours of use and still have life left in them! Just turned them off so we can use them in the future! Also, eco-friendly alert!!--> The batteries in these can be replaced! That means they can be used for a long time, rather than other brands where you have to throw them out once the batteries stop working (horrible for environmental impact). So glad that these have that added bonus! We needed these for a 10 year anniversary and vow renewal and they were just what we needed!!! 5 stars, will buy again if needed and recommending them to everyone who needs them!
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a Harry Potter themed birthday and hung them from the ceiling to create the look of floating candles. I was nervous about battery life because I needed to hang them almost 1 whole day before the party. After reading other reviews of how long they lasted I figured I would give them a try. I am so glad I did because they have literally lasted DAYS of being on non stop. They have a nice glowing color to them and are especially noticeable in the dark. This is also by far the best price you can find on a product such as this. I price matched with several other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many battery-operated candles overt the years, using them for evening historical events. These are especially nice. Having tried both, I prefer the yellow glow, and these have a soft pulse to them. The flame portion is a bit higher than usual, which is a plus, looks sturdy. I used them for settings in a fancy tea in a darkened oldtime theater and they were lovely. I don't know about battery life yet, but I suspect it will be good. I have to mention that in the box of 36, there was one "no go," but I consider that entirely reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska Kid

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love these candles
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these candles!! They flicker and in the dark the candles look real!! I'm so excited really adds a little Umff to my room!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Realistic flicker and awesome battery life.
customer_reviews.text: These little LED tealight candles worked great for the "floating" candles we made for halloween decorations and hung from the trees in our front yard (see photo). All you need is some cardboard tubes from used paper towel or toilet paper rolls, some hot wax for the dripping wax effect, and then a coat of spray paint and some fishing line to hang them. I loved the flickering effect, and the batteries lasted for several nights and probably still have a lot of juice. They could be a little brighter, but I suppose that's the trade-off for long battery life. We're thinking about doing a similar crafting project for Christmas decorations and will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: cherrm

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE! HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three boxes of these lights. Over half of the boxes didn’t work at all, even when we went and spent more money on batteries!! The ones that dd turn on only lasted a short period of time and they were not bright at all! I am highly disappointed in this product especially since I purchased THREE BOXES!! Highly do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Barbarick

customer_reviews.title: Last 3-4 days before dying!
customer_reviews.text: These tealights are very nice and come in handy. I have younger kids so burning real candles makes me nervous and I have a lot of decorations that use tealights. So these are the perfect solution. I left 3 of them on for 4 days before they finally died. I wanted to see how long they lasted before they died. That surprised me. I was only expecting to get a few hours out of them. They have a nice glow to them and will also come in handy when the electric goes out. They are durable and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: mamasingleton

customer_reviews.title: lasted atleast 100 hours. Super value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 sets of these candles for a Party Decor project. We lined the pathway with the candles inside the goblets. I doubted if they would last the whole night. I gave 6hrs heads up to the client Next morning when I went to collect my decor these csndles were still flickering. Wow I switched off every single one and saved them. Boy oh boy these little candles did not loose the light through 5 events and still working. Super value for money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reddy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Them!
customer_reviews.text: I can't comment on longevity yet since they just arrived today. I can say; I am extremely pleased at this point. The "flame" piece is larger than past lights I've purchased which means they produce more light. I used mine for various Christmas decor items. If you need tea lights, no need to look further. Get these. My only suggestion is I wish they came in a smaller lot. For example, a box of 6 or 12. I didn't need this many lights for my purpose so I will have lights for years OR until the batteries rot. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Flicker is nice, light is low.
customer_reviews.text: We used these in luminary bags and in jack o lanterns. They are significantly dimmer than a real tea lught and more orange in color. The flickering is fairly realistic. They looked good in the bags and gave a good effect, but contributed nothing to visibility even on a very dark path.
customer_reviews.author: aldridgec

customer_reviews.title: Actually less $ than candles and no open flame risk with pets in the house
customer_reviews.text: My wife will light a tea light but not be able to sit still long enough for it to burn out (~4 hours). After blowing one out they never really work well when you try to re-light them. These LED's claim ~100 hours per battery. That means one LED tea light is = 25 tea lights. So 36 LED tea lights is ~900 tea light candles. Plus the cats can't set the house on fire. At least not with these LED's anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Yelling Hound

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a simple prayer altar I have to pray for a relative's healing. These lights are beautifully made and radiate elegance. They are very long lasting, about ten days and all perform equally. This is important to me since I put out five new ones at the same time. I bought some cheaper ones, which disappointed, and will be going back to these when the others are used up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Delaney, MD, MS, author

customer_reviews.title: They did not even last 8 hours - other brands ...
customer_reviews.text: They did not even last 8 hours - other brands I purchased for less money lasted days even weeks. VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Gem B

customer_reviews.title: Good lights for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: LED tealights arrived in a box. No plastic packaging whatsoever. That alone is impressive since so many products are wrapped in some sort of plastic. Lights are great. ALL 36 worked. I tested them all. Honestly, for the price I was not expecting this. I thought some might be duds. I left one light on for 24 hrs and it is still working with the same brightness. The lights are not super bright but mimic a candle pretty well with a little flickering and the yellow tint.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered over 100 of these (3 packages) and I have to say I was very impressed. Not a single one disappointed me. They all worked. They lasted all day and into the night. I actually forgot one outside and it was still glowing strong the next day. I put these in the backyard and around the house for a party. People were amazed. They looked spectacular. Great purchase. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jbmlv

customer_reviews.title: LED tealights for pumpkins, windows, & other holiday decorations!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use in our jack-o-lanterns this year. My toddler has a very active imagination and uses them for many other things such as his stove light in his small kitchen. The "flame" on the candle is larger than I thought but not a deal breaker. The package arrived within two days of ordering (I ordered on a Saturday and received the following Monday). While I haven't turned them all on, the ones I have work well. The light is low and flickers to mimic candlelight. Very happy with my purchase and I recommend to anyone else looking for a small candle/tealight without the wax and flame of a real tealight.
customer_reviews.author: LotusEclipse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I needed these for a Girl Scout Camping ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I needed these for a Girl Scout Camping Craft for over 150 girls. Candles are exactly as described. Packaged incredibly well, too. Not a single candle was damaged or didn't work. (I ordered a bunch of extras thinking some would be defective. Not a single one.) Wow. Quality of candles is great. The candles flicker and look "real." Will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kmomof 3

customer_reviews.title: These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I set them all around the pool, within the centerpiece at Thanksgiving, and in candle holders. They are packaged well and I love them. However, while they state the battery life is for thousands of hours, you should note that the intensity of the light diminishes to about 50% after 24 - 72. Not an expensive item (and be sure to pull out the pink tab if you want them to work :) )....but don't expect miracles.
customer_reviews.author: LALLAW

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a dinky-lighted cheap-looking candle, this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I rated longevity as a 1 because there’s no option for aesthetic. They’re ugly. So I’ll never use again, hence short life. I’m throwing them out. It’s very noticeable that it’s not a real tea light. They look cheap, cheesy and not at all beautiful like a tea light. 1 on brightness because you can see my picture (where can I post my picture for this review?) shows the light emitted compared to the actual candle. And 3 for battery life because I never used them for more than overnight. So I know they can get through about 8-10 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great For Your Hurricane Survival Kit
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida, just south of the Cape. I bought these to have on hand during power outages during hurricane season. Now that Category 5 Dorian is bearing down on us I feel like these will be invaluable to me in the next few days. They are bright, and I tested one right after I received them and they last a long time too. I'm ready for a power outage and have them placed throughout my house to give me light to walk around when the power goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Smith

customer_reviews.title: You Will Be SO Glad You Bought These!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice that companies are making life-like LED candles these days!!! I put one into a luminary votive holder and I could not tell that it wasn't real and I'm a pretty picky person--lol!! I am really looking forward to using these all over my house this holiday season and beyond. We purchased ours through the seller OPPAPA and they not only were the best price around, they were WONDERFUL to work with--speedy, well-packaged shipping among other positives! We would highly recommend them and would definitely purchase with confidence from them again. Love these tea candles!! Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Radgear

customer_reviews.title: Nice set! Good value and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for advent candles since my kids annoy me with fire and matches. The flicker isn’t super noticeable and they look great clustered together. By December 24, I stopped turning each candle off/on for an hour each night and let them all “burn”. Some lasted one full day but some lasted over a week! All worked when we received them and all worked when we asked them to. The battery only ran down after being left on over day/days. We did through them away after I found that the batteries are more expensive than the candles! Will rebuy next year for same purpose. These would be great for parties, dances, weddings, churches.
customer_reviews.author: bld424

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting , high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy because I received my order in one day. I have a light lite in memory of my son since the day he died and I was unable to find the battery operated light that lasted for more then 3 days. It has been 6 days and the light is as bright as it was on day one. The price for these lights were less then what I was paying before and the quality is so much better. Nice to find a company who cares about their quality of their merchandise. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Weldingmama

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding! I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I need tea lights that will honestly work for a good twelve hours on Halloween. I didn't expect this would be successful and figured I'd be returning the box after testing a few in advance. It has been well over thirty hours and though fading... it has outlasted all competitors at the most inexpensive pricing. I'm extremely impressed! I'm switching brands to this one permanently. :-) I lend it my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: No more wax candles ever again ..
customer_reviews.text: I just received it a few hours ago and I’m very very happy... all of the candles work ...they look really nice ...saves me all the trouble of buying those wax candles ...the holders... the matches ... And I regular views how they last for days and days and days and days and days so I’m really looking forward to that and to be honest they look as good as real candles they may not smell as good considering the convenience looks like I’ll be using these for now on..great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kent K.

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Could Ask For In a Tealight Set at A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific set of tea lights at an amazing price. Really nice set of amber tea lights that are brighter than you would expect for the size. They come with a pull tab in each light to preserve the battery until you are ready to have them light. We will be using them to decorate tables for an event and they will be a great addition. They are lightweight, but not too light where you will be afraid that they will knocked over by a feather. Excellent price and I will be recommending them to family and friends and possibly buying another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TravelLovers1015

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as bright as a real tea light, but they lasted my entire 10 hour event
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of the claims they would last 100 hours. I've only used them once for a 10 hour event and they lasted without issue. I don't recall any of them dying early when I was packing them up at the end of the night. They're not as bright as a real tea light, but they were enough for accents around a table centerpiece. I will say don't drop them on a hard floor because I'm not convinced they'd survive the fall
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived quickly. Tealight just what I expected. In a small test I did with them, they outperformed some lights I bought locally. Good light output. The battery lasted >48 hours of continuous burn in 25 degree F weather. Cold weather always significantly shortens battery life, so I was very happy with these! I will recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpy75

customer_reviews.title: So BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I have found my solution for my ALL HOLIDAYS LUMINARY LIGHTING NEED OBSESSION! These tealights are PERFECT! LED. Bright. Sturdy. Plus, DISPOSABLE! Easy, peasy to use. Just pull the little plastic tab, turn it into the ON position...ALL SET. It will "burn" or "emit-LIGHT" for numerous hours. I put 2 inside my Halloween luminary bags. LOOK HOW BRIGHT! I am also planning on putting a handful inside my actual gourd Jack-O-Lantern this weekend when I carve it! Very good price too! I am glad I bought 36 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campagna

customer_reviews.title: So far great!
customer_reviews.text: Have a handful in use at that are close to 18 hours of up time. The brightness is mild for dark environments so they look pretty good. They don't have the same "flicker" as a real flame would have but are decent to simulate candle output. The Japan made batteries in this batch make this a great buy for the batteries alone! The local stores sell similar at ~$1+ per candle so the value is quite nice. Pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Lights EVER!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love real candles, I converted to tea lights years ago and have never looked back. I have tried probably every kind out there, and by far these are the best I have ever used. The battery lasts a super long time, and the flicker of the light mimics that of a real candle better than any other tea light I have ever bought. You can't beat the price for the quantity and the quality of them seals the deal!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, realistic, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: We got these tea lights to make floating candles for a Harry Potter birthday party and they worked perfectly! They had a nice orangey glow and a slight flicker which added to the realism. The batteries were still going strong after around 24 hours of use so they will be packed away for use at a later date. Highly recommend, these were a great value!
customer_reviews.author: David Gango

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for LED candles
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the price was excellent (less than $.50/candle). I have so many halloween candle holders and would be constantly having to relight them and watch out for fire hazards. With these, I can put them everywhere! I also love that they use a much more readily available battery (CR2032), unlike my older battery tea lights, which I have to special order. Can't wait to see how they hold up for Halloween night, but so far they are doing great! One battery did come without the cover, but it has not affected how the candle at all (the battery is secure and the light works). I put it in a witch statue cauldron for some added ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Witt

customer_reviews.title: Tea Lights
customer_reviews.text: These LED tea lights are a little bit larger than ones I’ve purchased from stores in the past. The base is thicker, and the flame is taller. This was not a problem for my Oui-yogurt-jar craft purposes, but they may not fit in smaller votives. Out of the whole box, only one would not turn on. However, some of them flicker like a candle and some don’t, with no rhyme or reason. Overall these were a reasonable price and worked well for our group craft.
customer_reviews.author: Zhandra

customer_reviews.title: If you need LED tealight candles, these are the ones you want.
customer_reviews.text: These flameless LED tea light candles are totally worth the purchase. They come securely packaged in a box made from recycled materials. The candles are bright, comparable to the brightness of a real flame; they also flicker like a real flame. I have only tested three of them and they all worked well. I’m gifting a few of them to my three year old to use in a faux campfire toy and a few are going to my nearly thirteen year old daughter to use in some cute tea light holders. So far, I’m very happy with my purchase. I’ll update this review if I encounter any problems with this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Malesia Powers

customer_reviews.title: These are a wonderful invention!
customer_reviews.text: These things are an amazing value! They give off a nice flickering light just like "real" candles. And because they come with the batteries already installed you can just take them out of the box and switch them on. I haven't checked all 36 of them for batteries or if they're working but I have priced the CR2032 batteries that they use and they're cheap enough to just buy some to have on hand. Wish I had found these at Christmastime - so glad I have them for this year!
customer_reviews.author: KingSimba

customer_reviews.title: Plain white base flicker plastic lights. ts.
customer_reviews.text: Using recharsble Brookstone train lights 4 yrs but no longer offer. Shame. These what u pay for. Little white plastic lights. Look fine in salt lamps, etc. Battery life? One going strong, others out by 4th day (8hr period). Supposed run 100,000 has! Maybe all combined. Light not as good as expensive ones, but price great 4 what u get. Fast delivery & well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty candles cheer up a hospice room at night
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for a whole bunch of little votive candles. They are bright and have a nice warm yellow glow. They seem to have about 40-70 hours worth of glow to them. We have used them to make a hospital room cheerful at night and they work perfectly. Left on all night most nights they seem to last about 5-7 days. They do get a bit paler towards the end of their battery life but you definitely get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pershouse

customer_reviews.title: Impressive battery life but dim
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The packaging was very nice, and all the lights work. I used a couple of these to test the battery life, and one of them lasted 6days and the other 7days - being on for 24 hours. They have a flickering effect which is very nice. Safer than having a flame in house. Cons- Very dim lights. I wish they were a little brighter. I would have been happier if they lasted 3 days instead of 6 and were brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Arka Santra

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to see these came in a sturdy box as I will only be using a few at a time. Each candle also has a strip preventing the battery from being activated until it is removed. As soon as I opened the box I put 2 into votives and placed them on our dining room table to surprise my wife. She loved them but I forgot to turn them off. 24 hours later they were still going strong. Since then I have used these 2 for an additional 10 hours or so and have seen no degradation.
customer_reviews.author: William Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you want very yellow light
customer_reviews.text: These are nice quality, but just FYI they are very very yellow. Much more so than natural candle or what is normally called “warm white” in household lights. I bought them to use in my handmade glass votive holders and the yellow tone of the light completely obliterated the color design of the votive (violet turned brown, red became orange, etc)
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sabatier

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles for two reasons -- I want to put one on a birthday cupcake for a coworker, but can't use a real candle, and I have always wanted to put candles in my windows. I have one of the candles on while I'm writing this and the light flickers, just like a real flame. They were sent quickly, safely, and I can't wait to see what they look like in my windows at night! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Barnat

customer_reviews.title: So easy, right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. All you have to do is pull the little tab, switch to "on" and you have beautiful candlelight. I have an iron flying reindeer sculpture and the lights fit into holders behind to light up the scene. They look so nice and I don't have to worry about any fire hazard. Each tea light has its own replaceable battery. Don't know yet about longevity or battery life, but I like that there is an on/off switch so that the lights need not run continuously; you can decide when to turn them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDA S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased :-)
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, but there were about half a dozen or so that didn't work. I'll try replacing the batteries, but it was disappointing that a brand new product didn't work. On the other hand, it was a great price, so it's not worth returning for just a few lemons. Thanks for shipping so quickly, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier! Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little LED flickering tea lights! It was an incredible deal for 36 lights. I have only used them for one day so I can't testify to the battery life but based on what other reviewers said, I'm expecting that these will last a long time. Although they aren't really bright, they are perfect for my dual use: spooky set and Halloween decor lighting. I'm definitely planning on ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: dantealis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and realistic flame!
customer_reviews.text: After sending back tealights that had a bright blue/white light I was pleased to find these with a realistic yellow flame. They were beautiful in our centerpieces and lasted the whole event. I don't know how long they will last because none have quit working yet! They were the perfect size for our mercury glass votive cups and looked warm and inviting. The price was excellent for how many you received. Best price, excellent quality, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are really cool! I purchased them to place throughout my religious alter and in our pumpkins for Halloween, and wow, I am really impressed. Left them on all night and they lasted! They slightly flicker like real candles and the operation works by simply toggling a tiny switch at the bottom of each one. I like how they are battery operated and one thing I looked at before purchasing is the cost of the batteries; they are inexpensive. Getting 36 in a pack is a great deal for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights were perfect for my project. I did a snowman Christmas ornament for a K5 class and they loved it. The candle wicks are long so they gave the snowmen more of an Olaf look that the kids loved. Every light in the box worked and the packaging was great! This was a great price for the item. Product was NOT cheaply made and was packaged so that the wicks would not be destroyed in route to my class with them. Would recommend this product if looking for bulk lights for project or event!
customer_reviews.author: Tootles

customer_reviews.title: Great little battery lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to surprise my nephews with a fairy trail in the woods between 2 houses. I had to leave around 5 and I set out the lights and turned them on before I left. They were thoroughly enchanted when they traveled back to grandma’s house that night at 10 pm. The glow is yellow and kind of flickers like a candle. My town also had their first ever lantern parade this past weekend. I was thrilled with their brightness and ease of use. I still have some left and am thinking about what else I might do with them. The price was very reasonable and they arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Red Truck

customer_reviews.title: Nice little led tealights
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wedding reception last month and they are nice. The candles aren't amazingly bright but they did look nice in my lotus table pieces. They flicker and look cute! I still have a lot of them I ended up not using but I also use them around the house now (I have birds and candles are a no go with them). I plan on using them for Halloween now since I'm doing a witch's hut and I think these would be perfect. So far I haven't had any batteries dying so that's a plus. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I actually got these in the mail today. I plan to use them for various DIY Halloween projects so I let theft them lit for hours with no failures. They have a nice flickering effect to look like real candles. Unfortunately, I dropped them several times so I know they are durable. They turn on via a black switch underneath which couldn't be any easier. I would buy these again for future lighting projects.
customer_reviews.author: wendy rinebold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 24 of these flameless LED tea light candles at two different stores before for the same price I got these and received 12 more buying from here! They are easy to use and the battery is already in so all you have to do is remove the plastic tab and turn them on, which was great. I like how they flicker so it resembles a real flame. I've bought others from a different place and they didn't flicker and I paid more for them then these. I just bought them so not sure about battery life but they are working great as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy with a long battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my baby shower. I put them into “floating” globes. I turned the candles on at about 11 am. I was hesitant at first because I didn’t want them to burn out.. but I had to turn them on so we can move the tables and chairs into place. The battery life lasted!! We took down decorations a few days later and the candles were still lit! Not as bright as the first two nights but still on!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These lights last forever! I wanted to test the battery life so I left one on and by the end of the first week it had dimmed a lot but it was still on. By the 8th day it was almost completely dim but even so it was still lit. We ended up turning it off but I have to say either we got sooo lucky or these are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon19

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an art class. My students are studying Asian art and culture and are planning a demonstration around the Indian Diwali Festival. They are making Diyas and we are using these tea lights to light them as our school prefers students not to use acutal fire. This was a great value. Thanks! Will possibly post a pic later as the project is not yet finished.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Completely surprised how long it lasted! 96 hours+
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave a review, like most people. A product has to be really bad or really amazing for me to take the time to put pen to paper or finger to keyboard as it were. I have to just say that we put the lights out on Halloween afternoon and I forgot I’d had one lit somewhere I don’t go very often. A guest bathroom. I just went in there and... what? There’s that little candle flickering away! It’s Monday night! That’s 96 hours! It was still bright, too! I really wasn’t expecting that type of life with this little thing. I’m totally happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alex d.

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a 2 star instead of 1 star because you can't really expect anything for free. Count on getting what you pay for. These are inexpensive and do not last over 100 hours as described. They are very dim and battery goes out quickly. Some of these did not last 10 hours!! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Every fall and winter, I dig through my holiday bins in the basement only to realize I don't have any tea lights or the once I have never worked to begin with. These are great - they all work, are really affordable, and it's such a big box that I have extras for when I lose them in the holiday shuffle!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for festival of light “Diwali “
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for lights for Diwali So purchased them , these r really nice n bright candle with a real flame feel to em They have long battery life , were on for the whole night and still going on Made my diwali really special Really pleased with my purchase Will surely buy again
customer_reviews.author: preety

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use with my many Halloween decorations this year because the ones I purchased previously did not last long at all without needing to replace the batteries and this one had great reviews for that particular issue. I can say that the reviews for this product were not wrong. I used these for several hours a night, for about 2 weeks, and they still seem as bright as the day I pulled them out of the package. I've very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Romantic Touch
customer_reviews.text: I used this at an Airbnb for a romantic evening it was so beautiful I left them in for two days and they were easy to turn on and stayed on for the entire trip. I did leave them on during the day which was unnecessary but I was too lazy to turn them off. Very romantic and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tea Light Candles!
customer_reviews.text: I just love tea lights! I was buying them at my local department store but they are so darn expensive! I am so glad I found these on Amazon! What an awesome deal! I love that the flame is realistic and much larger! They are just perfect and I will be buying more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fake candlelight
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a Harry Potter themed birthday party. We created 'floating' candles that hung from the ceiling and these worked perfectly. The shape of the flame is nice and the flicker effects ware great. We haven't tested the battery life, but so far they are all working great.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Flameless tealights are a great alternative for those with allergies!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this box of flameless tealights to fix all of our holders on the top floor of our home. My husband really struggles with allergies year round and burning tealights in the area where he sleeps is just miserable for him! These flameless tealights are the perfect solution!!! SO pretty, affordable, and long-lasting. I would definitely buy them again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. W

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of 36 for diwali. I was glad that all 36 worked and some even stayed on for multiple days (all the lights that were left on were still on after over 3 days of continuous use in cold and rain - #thingswedoforourkids!!). Very pleasing flickering effect and great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Tejaswini Kale

customer_reviews.title: So many for the price my new fave
customer_reviews.text: These tea lights have a large flame flickering very realistic and in my Happy room lol I use these along with my lighting defusser and my Bluetooth plays Celtic relaxation, I’m very relaxed. I also use them in the bathroom and Wall votives! Beautiful. I am sue you can replace the battery’s. Boxed very organized & nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RAINASADDICTEDTOAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my wedding, and they worked out so beautifully! They lasted my entire wedding reception, and 6 months later, they all still turn on. I accidentally left one on my kitchen table, and it stayed on for a few days until I found it and turned it off. They are bright, and look beautiful. They flicker like real candle light. I highly recommend these for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Arteaga

customer_reviews.title: exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: I am planning to set up a surprise dinner date at home for my husband At first I was hesitant to buy this cause I was thinking it would look fake since its LED. But then after I saw reviews of other customers I gave it a try and It exceeded my expectation. The flames looks real as it flickers its 36 pcs for that amount is best price can get. Also I dont have to worry about burning my plastic tablecloth. Kudos to the seller and to amazon
customer_reviews.author: MYRA CATLI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crafting!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bunch of battery-operated tea lights for a craft I did with my middle school girls group, and these were PERFECT! We painted mason jars and the lights were bright enough to shine through the painted glass, and the glowing effect made them look like real candles! The girls loved their DIY night lights, and I loved the low price and fast shipping. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for floating candles I'm making for Halloween, tested them out to see how long they would last and how long they would stay bright. The first day they were bright all day, however after that they became very dim. On the flip side of that I can say they have last on continuously 24/7 for over 2 weeks. So I can deal with them being dim if they are going to last that long. They are still going btw.
customer_reviews.author: Mindymouse03

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light
customer_reviews.text: Professional packaging which kept all the lights intact and also provided easy access storage. Love the idea batteries are replaceable. I use tea lights all year long. Nice to know they’re safely stored in a box that doesn’t take up a huge space. I’m confident they will stand behind their product. And, the price I’d definitely right!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Lit
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect for my crafting needs! They're bright, size is perfect, and just thrilled with the product! They all came in one piece, great condition. Also enjoy the fact they use recycled boxes as that is my crafting style, using old and recycled pieces... Great biy!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal, and great product!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened my tealight candles, I first noticed that the product packaging was sturdy and sleek, almost as if I was opening an expensive electronic, lol! Then the tealights themselves were very neatly packed and arranged within the box. Very impressive that they were not only safely contained in the product package, but also that every single one worked! They have long-lasting batteries, and the flicker looks more realistic than some other battery operated candles I have purchased. I will buy these again for events and holidays, because they're honestly great cost-effective!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting LED tea lights
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order from this company as I gifted an order to our church and kept the first order. The flame is realistic and lasts longer than other LED candles. The price is right, the product is excellent and you definitely get your money's worth. Excellent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Work and look great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a birthday party and they worked great, lasted hours outside and looked great as well. I plan on using them for many more events in the future, including Halloween as they flicker perfectly. After 6+ hours of use they work great and held up to my 3 year old daughter turning them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Launius

customer_reviews.title: I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: These candles are perfect for my projects. I use them for creating small, crafted scenes with flickering light and they give the perfect type of illumination (this is not a bright light, but it is exactly what I was hoping for). I was impressed right away when I received my package; the candles were packed in a nice box in a way that shows that significant thought and care has gone into the shipping process. I did not expect such a nice experience considering the great price. Inside the box, all of the candles were intact and functional once I pulled out the plastic battery-protecting slip. I will but these again when I need more candles of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a craft show - looked everywhere for a package of tealights that looked realistic and didn't eat batteries. These look very realistic, the flame looks real (flickering effect), the battery lasts, and I'm very happy with my purchase. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Item is exactly as described. Turned all lights on for the first time at 5:45pm and turned them off at 11:30pm the same evening. I noticed one of the lights was very faint midway through the evening which was disappointing. The majority of lights were still quite bright at the end of the evening; only one was very, very dim.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I've used many brands of tealights and I must say, we ordered these for a wedding reception and they were great. I like the warm light and they lasted much longer than anticipated! We expected that they would burn out and be tossed at the end of the night, instead I brought ALL of them home since they still have a lot of life left in them. They make great little decorations for bathrooms!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Served my purpose PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.text: These candles were amazing. They sell some similar in stores, but those don't even compare. I wanted to set up for Valentine's Day and I lit these at 7 p.m. before leaving for dinner. I was very skeptical because I figured the battery life might be short, but I was wrong. These lights were still shining bright at 3 a.m. I cut them off the next morning, repackaged them, and reused them last week. I'm more than pleased with this purchase- they shine bright and provide just enough light. I would highly recommend! Great value for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: These are so much brighter and nicer than my old tea light candles.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tea light candles to replace the old dull ones I had. After reading reviews, I ordered them and love them! They are so much brighter than my old ones. I was only planning to use a dozen, but ended up putting them all around for decorating for Halloween. They are inside Jack-o-lanterns and votives, plus by the dried leaves and gourds. I like the way they flicker like real candles. Really looks great! Hopefully the batteries will last a long time. I usually just turn them on when I am having company, but now I may have them on more often!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good little lights at a great price. Haven't tried to run one until it dies yet so i cant speak for battery life. Hope they last awhile. I got them for halloween and power outage situations if i dont want to burn candles because of the heat already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: These have a longer "flame" than some other battery tea lights. The lights flicker nicely as well. All the candles were in a very nice box with plastic in each candle to keep the battery from being activated. Will be using for a Harry Potter birthday. Perfect ambiance for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Borman

product_meta.title: Flameless LED Tea Light Candles, 36 PK Vivii Battery-Powered Unscented LED Tealight Candles, Fake Candles, Tealights (36 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Powered by one single widely available & inexpensive CR-2032 Lithium-ion button cell, the Vivii LED tealight candle can stay lit for well over one hundred hours. And it's a great value and ideal for weddings, restaurants and parties. Coming in a generous package of 36, these candle lights realistically generate flickering effect to simulate burning candles, better yet there's no more black smoke or flame, nothing to clean up. The long-lasting LED bulbs have an average life time of 200,000 hours.

Please remove the plastic insulation tape prior to use.
feature_bullets: A generous package of 36 candles with batteries included and installed, ready to use and easy to turn on or off with a sliding switch. Standard size tea light candles fit into any votives, tea light holders, and luminary bags
Long-life, energy-efficient, and environment-friendly LED light powered by one single CR2032 replaceable button cell (included and installed), estimated to last over 100 hours with one new battery
Better safe than sorry, these candles are flameless and smoke-free, absolutely no fire hazards or burning risks, safe for families with pet(s) or young child(ren)

Battery-powered (battery included & installed) amber color LED tea light candles provide realistic flickering effect, ideal for accent decorations for holiday celebrations, wedding ceremonies, special occasions such as birthdays and anniversaries, memorial services, church gatherings, DIY projects and etc. Wind-proof for both indoors and outdoors use, at homes, restaurants, churches, schools, backyards, sports venues and etc.

100% SATISFACTION- We are extremely committed to our customers. If you don't fall in love with your LED Candles the moment you open the packaging, we PROMISE your money back. We then back that up with a 10 Year satisfaction. (defection, accidental damage, non-satisfaction) You won't find another vendor who offers that. It's not just a promise, it's a matter of our brand integrity.
